title: Tank Meta.....
body:
Why is it so bad this season? I'm starting to enjoy league less and less. Last season everyone complained about the assassin meta, it wasn't easy but you could just select someone with any hard cc and you could handle them. But every game nowadays I come up against a Garen, Naut or Cho'Gath (especially Cho *shudders*) and they're just un-killable, and I find myself playing tanks a lot more now just out of necessity, even though I'd rather play others. Y u do dis rito. 


Also nerfing cinder in lane did nothing lel.

replies.body:
The cinderhulk is a stupid item and tanks are 2 strong now. 

You cant play a huge list of champs anymore because they just cant kill tanks.

tanks take the skill of the game because they can just do what every they want and there is no way to punish them. Riot needs to realize that they are losing a lot of casual players who just want to have fun. Because if they play the champing they want to play they cant win the game.

Black cleaver and last whisper for AD.
Void staff for AP.
BotRK/Liandry's against health.

Why are you complaining instead of actually beating what the tanks use.

Honestly i do have a small unlike for tank meta simply because my nidalee isn't AS strong in the current tank meta, but you can still use her decently if you play smart.

If they're stacking mRes, get magic pen.
If they're stacking armour, get armour pen.
If they're stacking health, get an ap/ad item which counters health (liandrys/bork respectively) {{item:3151}}  {{item:3153}} 

If you're complaining about ranked (which you should be, if you're complaining about tanks in normals... THEN JOIN THEM ), then I don't know, pick a champion with inbuilt shred/%health?

Kayle? Vayne? AD Kog'maw? Irelia? Tank olaf with true damage? There's so much versatility when it comes to counterpicking tanks, both in blind and ranked.
Bork is key in this meta
